DOC.brief_title: Regionalized Pediatric Emergency Care Rural Pennsylvania
DOC.detailed_description: The OUTREACH project develop , implement evaluate organize system regional pediatric emergency care rural western Pennsylvania . Toward end investigator develop three broad goal : ( 1 ) define key barrier potential solution regionalized pediatric emergency care community stakeholder engagement ; ( 2 ) implement regionalized system pediatric emergency care use education , community outreach telemedicine ; ( 3 ) evaluate impact system health care access outcomes rural child . The investigator implement intervention sample rural hospital Pennsylvania use stagger roll-out design , compare outcome child see hospital similar match hospital state , use Pennsylvania state Medicaid data evaluate impact intervention .
DOC.criteria: Pennsylvania Medicaid beneficiary Less equal 18 year age
